title: [Gameplay ] Ekko's Q is Bugged
body: Timewinder (Q) on the way back lost it's particles when it hits a unit and sometimes doesn't play it's sound. I remember this was a thing back in late 2015. It's here again this patch.

replies.body:
Morning Igotlazy! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and looking at the issue this morning. :)
